name: Plunging Platforms
description:
Plunging Platforms!

Need a gamepad/controller to play.

You can teleport and your patience is being tested.

How the game relates to the theme "worn thin":

The game is about a test subject who has teleporting powers. The subject must race and solve the treacherous plunging platform puzzles. While being antagonized by an annoying lab tech.  Can you make across the platforms that are worn so thin that they break the moment you step off them, while maintaining your sanity while the lab tech tries to wear your mental state thin? Good luck, and enjoy!

Made for Curdle Jam #9
